node.html: At first dawn, there was nothing, then there was light, quite bright, so much so that I expected, to paraphrase Gabriel Marxus, the 9 solar planets to explode before my eyes, if not another 4. I was still galloping towards the dam, our meeting place. The mountains blocked all the incoming lights
